column2: "Nna Farisiifo nye kyerɛwfo a wofi Jerusalɛm baa Jesus nkyɛn bebisaa no dɛ
column4: "Ɔyɛ dɛn na w’esuafo fom mpanyimfo atsetsesɛm do? Dɛ wɔnnhohor hɔn nsa ho ana woedzidzi yi?"

column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn na hom so hom atsetsesɛm ntsi hom fom Nyankopɔn mbrasɛm do?"
Dzi w’egya nye wo na nyi
column5: Obiara a ɔhyɛ egya anaa na ahorba no

column3: hom se dɛ
column4: Obiara a ɔbɛse n’egya anaa ne na dɛ
column5: Dza nkyɛ edze benya mo ho mfaso yɛ akyɛdze ma Nyankopɔn
column7: "nna onnyi dɛ odzi n’egya nyi. Na hom atsetsesɛm ntsi hom amma Nyankopɔn mbra no enntsim."

column3: Isaia hyɛɛ hom ho nkɔm yie dɛ ɔse
column5: "Ɔman yi dze hɔn anofamfa dzi me nyi

column3: Wɔkyerɛkyerɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ a ɔyɛ nyimpa ahyɛdze."

column2: "Na Jesus frɛɛ nyimpadodow no baa ne nkyɛn no
column3: ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Hom ntsie na hom ntse ase:"

column2: "Nnyɛ dza ɔkɔ anomu na ogu nyimpa ho fi
column3: na mbom dza ofi anomu ba no na ogu nyimpa ho fi."

column2: "Nna n’esuafo no bae bɛsee no dɛ
column3: Inyim dɛ Farisiifo no tsee asɛm yi no
Dua biara a m’Egya a ɔwɔ sor no anntsɛw no

column2: "Hom ngyaa hɔn: wɔyɛ akwankyerɛfo enyifurafo. Na sɛ onyifurafo kyerɛ onyifurafo kwan a
column3: hɔn beenu nyina bɔtɔ mona mu."
Kyerɛ hɛn bɛ yi ase."
Ana hom so nnyae nnyaa ntseasee?"

column2: "Ana hom nnhu dɛ biribiara a ɔhɛn anomu no ɔkɔ yafun mu
column3: na woyi gu tsea mu?"
ofi akoma mu
column4: na ɔno na ogu nyimpa ho fi."

column2: "Na akoma mu na adwembɔn fi ba
column3: ewudzi

column2: "yinom nye ndzɛmba a ogu nyimpa ho fi; na edze nsa a wɔannhohor ho bedzidzi dze
column3: onngu nyimpa ho fi."

column2: "Na Jesus twee noho fii hɔ kɔr Taere nye Sidon afamu."

column3: Keenannyi ɔbaa fi ntoaado hɔ bae bɛkaa mu dɛ
column6: hu me mbɔbɔr: na abɔnsam rehaw me babaa papa."

column2: "Na oemmbua no asɛm biara. Na n’esuafo no bae bɛserɛɛ no dɛ
column3: Gya no kwan ma ɔnkɔ
column4: na ɔrekeka mu dzi hɛn ekyir."

column3: Wɔannsoma me obiara hɔ dɛ Israel fie nguan a wɔayew no nko hɔ."
Ewuradze
Ɔnnsɛ dɛ wɔfa mba edziban tow ma nkramanmba."
Mo wura
column4: nyew: naaso nkramanmba no dzi mporoporoba a ofi hɔn wuranom pon do gu no bi."

column3: Ɔbaa
column4: wo gyedzi so: ɔnyɛ hɔ mma wo dɛ mbrɛ epɛ.  Na ofi dɔn no ara mu ne babaa no ho yɛɛ no dzen."

column2: "Na Jesus fii hɔ baa Galilii po ho
column3: na ɔkɔr koko do kɛtsenaa ase wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na nyimpadodow pii baa ne nkyɛn a wɔdze mbubua
column3: enyifurafo
column6: nye binom pii; na wɔdze hɔn boguu n’ananadze na ɔsaa hɔn yarba:"

column2: "ma ɔyɛɛ nyimpadodow no nwanwa dɛ mmum rekasa
column3: mpakye ridzi mu
column5: na enyifurafo ruhu adze; na wɔhyɛɛ Israel Nyankopɔn enyimnyam."

column2: "Na Jesus frɛɛ n’esuafo see hɔn dɛ
column3: Me yamu hyehye me ma nyimpadodow yi
column4: osiandɛ wɔatsena me nkyɛn ndaansa yi na wonnyi biribi a wodzi; na memmpɛ dɛ migya hɔn kwan ma wɔdze kɔm kɔ
column5: bɛyɛ na wɔakɔtɔ bitsi wɔ kwan mu."

column3: Henfa na yebenya paanoo a ɔbɛmee nyimpadodow pii yi wɔ sar do ha?"
Paanoo ahen na hom wɔ?  Na wɔsee no dɛ

column2: "Na ɔhyɛɛ nyimpadodow no dɛ wɔntsenatsena famu;"

column3: nye esunam no; na ɔdaa ase
column6: na esuafo no so dze maa nyimpadodow no."

column2: "Na hɔn nyina dzidzii mee; na wɔtasee mporoporoba a ɔkae no
column3: mbirefi esuon amaama."
wɔyɛ mpemanan a wɔnnkan mbaa nye mbofraba nnka ho."
na ɔfoow hɛn baa Magadan ntoaado."
